程序包 com.java.cuiyikai.androidbackend.controllers

类 ProblemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.cuiyikai.androidbackend.controllers.ProblemController
  • @Controller
@RequestMapping("/api/problem")
public class ProblemController
extends java.lang.Object

    Controller for the problem-related apis.

    Mapped to url "/api/problem"

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSuggestProblem

        @GetMapping("/")
public void getSuggestProblem​(@RequestParam("token")
                              java.lang.String token,
                              @RequestParam(value="offset",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                              int offset,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                       throws java.io.IOException

        Get the first 15 suggest problems after offset according to user's search history and visit history

        Map to url "/"

        Uses RequestMethod.GET method.

        Reply a JSONObject as follows:

        
 {
     "status" : "ok" / "fail",
     "data"   : [{
         "problem" : {
             "qBody" : < problem statement >,
             "qAnswer" : < problem answer >
         },
         "subject" : < problem subject >
     }, ...]
 }
        参数:
        token - User's request token.
        offset - (optional) default value is 0. offset of the data array. result will begin from the offset th problem.
        response - A HttpServletResponse, see GetMapping.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - see GetMapping

      • addNewSaveProblem

        @PostMapping("/addNewSave")
public void addNewSaveProblem​(@RequestBody
                              com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject jsonParam,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                       throws java.io.IOException

        Add a new problem to user's problem book

        Map to url "/addNewSave"

        Use RequestMethod.POST method.

        Return a JSONObject only include key status.

        参数:
        jsonParam - A request JSONObject, shoul contain following keys.

        "token" : User's request token. "problem" : A JSONObject, should contain qAnswer and qBody key. "subject" : Problems subject.

        response - A HttpServletResponse, see PostMapping.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - see PostMapping

      • getSaves

        @GetMapping("/getSaves")
public void getSaves​(@RequestParam("token")
                     java.lang.String token,
                     @RequestParam(value="offset",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                     int offset,
                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
              throws java.io.IOException

        Get all the problems from user's problem book

        Map to url "/getSaves"

        Use RequestMethod.GET method.

        Reply a JSONObject as follows:

        
 {
     "status" : "ok" / "fail",
     "data"   : [{
         "problem" : {
             "qBody" : < problem statement >,
             "qAnswer" : < problem answer >
         },
         "subject" : < problem subject >
     }, ...]
 }
        参数:
        token - user's request token
        offset - (optional) default value is 0. offset of the data array. result will begin from the offset th problem.
        response - A HttpServletResponse, see GetMapping.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - see GetMapping

      • deleteSaveProblem

        @PostMapping("/deleteSave")
public void deleteSaveProblem​(@RequestBody
                              com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject jsonParam,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                       throws java.io.IOException

        Delete a problem from user's problem book

        Map to url "/deleteSave"

        Use RequestMethod.POST method.

        Return a JSONObject only include key status.

        参数:
        jsonParam - A request JSONObject, shoul contain following keys.

        "token" : User's request token. "problem" : A JSONObject, should contain qAnswer and qBody key. "subject" : Problems subject.

        response - A HttpServletResponse, see PostMapping.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - see PostMapping
